2.「じつは 黒怨王の封印が 予想以上に早く| 破られようと しているみたいなの……: It seems that the Hell King's seal is about to|be broken sooner than expected... and that's|why the grudge is increasing in number.

3.「まぁ……ともかく。この勢いだと 黒怨王が| 完全復活し 世界が 怨霊におおわれ:
Well... anyway. At this rate, it's only a|matter of time before the Hell King returns|and the world is covered in grudges. So before|
|that happens...

4.「あなたには 黒怨王を倒すのに 必要な| 踊り子の 奥義を習得してほしいの。|: I need you to master the secrets of the dancer|necessary to defeat the Hell King. You'll do|it, won't you?

5.「そうよね。私の合方だものね。| 聞くまでも なかったわ……。: Yes, of course. It's my combination. I didn't|need to ask...

6.「じつは その奥義を 習得するには| わたしたち 踊り子の 守護神……| 踊り神: To master the secrets of this art, we need the|amulet of the God of Dance... the guardian|deity of dancers.

7.「あなたには それを手に入れてほしいの。| これから その方法を 説明するから|: I want you to have it. Explanation of how to|do that is coming up, so please listen|carefully.

8.「まずは ウェナ諸島 ジュレー島上層にいる| <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を: First, defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>|in Jule Upper Island in Wena Islands.

9.「ただし 普通に 倒すだけじゃダメよ。| 敵に おどりスキルの ふういんのダンス:
However, it is not enough to just defeat them.|You must perform the Dance of Sealing on the|enemy, and defeat them while the effect is|
|still active.

10.「<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>匹 倒し終えた時 古き伝説のしぐさ……| 踊: When you have defeated <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of them,|you'll learn a legendary gesture, a special dance to call upon the|God of Dance, a gesture from an ancient legend.

11.「その踊りを ウェナ諸島 ラーディス王島の| 北部に点在する ９つの小舞台……そ:
If that dance is performed on one of the nine|small stages that dot the northern part of|King Ladis Island in the Wena Islands... the|
|one farthest from wisdom... ...

12.「伝承の間への道が 開かれるわ。| そこで 踊り神さまが あなたの実力を| 認め: It will lead you to the Hall of Lore. There,|the God of Dance will recognize your abilities|and grant you an amulet.

13.「踊り神さまは 荒神さまの 異名を持つほど| 強く 激しいお方……。認めてもらう: The God of Dance is so strong and fierce that|he's known as Powerful Deity. It's hard to get|recognition... but I'm sure you'll be fine.

14.「それじゃ……がんばってね。| 私も あなたに負けないよう 修行してくるわ。|: Well then...good luck. I'm going to go train|so that I don't lose to you. The day of the|battle is near!

15.「ありがとう。だけど あなた……| 他の仕事が つまってるみたいよ。| さすがは: Thank you. But you... seem to be stuck with|other work. That's my partner. You're very|popular.

16.「でも……本当にもう 時間がないの。| だから 早く終わらせて| また 戻ってき: But...I really don't have much time left. So|please hurry up and come back.

17.「もう！ 今さら 怖気づくなんて。| それでも あなた 私の合方なの？: Already!　I can't believe you're scared of me|after all this time. Are you still my partner?

18.「まあ いずれにせよ そんな調子じゃ| 修行をこなすのは 無理そうね。| 気合い:
Well, in any case, it looks like you won't be|able to complete your training at this rate.|You'd better get yourself together and come|
|back.

20.「ようこそ 踊り子チャン。おっと……| これじゃあ お顔が 見えないわネ。: Welcome, Dancer. Oops...I can't see your face.

21.「なるほどネ。ウフフッ……ラブリィ<heart>| ただ いたずらに 腰をクネク: I see. I see...Lovely...unlike the recent|bunch of cowards who are just wiggling their|hips for no reason at all!

22.「でも！ 荒神の異名をもつ このワタシ……| 踊り神ボニータの ラブリィな荒ぶり: But!　I, Dance God Bonita, also known as|Powerful Deity, am so lovingly rough. How can|you not be bowled over by this?

24.「ピーヒャラピーヒャラ……！| ズコズコドンドン……！: Pee-hoo, pee-hoo, pee-hoo...! Thump, thump,|thump, thump...!

27.「この勢いに 飲まれないなんてネ……。| ウフフッ……ラブリィ<heart>|: I can't believe I haven't been swept up in|this momentum...Lovely<heart> You are quite a rough|one, aren't you?

28.「いいワ。全力で 荒ぶってあげル。| そして 荒ぶり比べで 私に勝ったなラ……|:
That's okay. I'll give it my all. And if you|beat me in the contest of roughness, I will|recognize you as the one who has passed down|
|the secrets of the art!

30.「あららラ？ こりもせずに| 舞い戻ってくるとは お馬鹿さんネ。| でも……ウフ: Oh, la?　You're a fool to come back here|without doing anything. But...tee-hee...lovely|<heart>.

31.「あきらめの悪い子は 嫌いじゃないノ。| 何度だって 荒ぶり殺しにしてあげるワ。: I don't hate a girl who gives up. I'm gonna|beat you to death over and over again. Come|on!　Come on!

33.「あっふ～ん……。この私が| ここまで コテンパンに| 荒ぶり負け するなんテ…: I can't believe I've been beaten to a pulp so|severely...

34.「でもね。ウフフッ……ラブリィ<heart>| 負けちゃうの……じつは 三度目な: But. Tee-hee...lovely<heart> This is the third|time I've lost. Struck out!　I'm not quite|there yet either.

35.「それにしても あなたの 荒ぶりレベルは| 以前の ふたりと比べても なかなかの:
But your level of roughness is still quite|impressive compared to the two of us before.|Don't forget. That roughness is the essence of|
|dancing.

36.「踊り子の 魂と肉体の荒ぶりは| ラブリィなエナジィを 生み出すわ。| 生者を鼓: The dancer's soul and the wildness of her body|produce Lovely Energies. Energies that inspire|the living and purify the grudge.

37.「そのエナジィで みんなのテンションを| アゲアゲに しちゃうのが| ワタシの授: The energy of the Deity Dance is what makes|everyone's spirits soar.

38.「さあ……約束どおり アナタを| その継承者として 認めてあげるワ。| あれを: Now... as promised, I'm going to recognize you|as its heir. I have to give it to you.

39.「ガサゴソ……ガサゴソ……っト。| あら？ どこの羽根に 仕舞ったかしラ。| ガ: Rustle...rustle...rustle.... Oh?　Where did you|put them in the feathers?|Rustle...rustle...rustle...rustle...

40.「あ……あン！ こんなところニ。| よかっタ よかっタ。あったわヨ。| ハイ！: Ah... ah!　This is the place. That's good.|That's good. There it is. Hey!　Here, take|this.

42.「あとは 合方となる踊り子に| 継承の儀を 執りおこなってもらえバ……| 奥義を: Then, the dancer who will be your partner will|perform the inheritance ceremony and you will|be able to learn the secrets of the art.

43.「奥義を 必要としているということは| 黒怨王の復活は 近いのネ……。| 幸運を: If he needs the secrets, Hell King's|resurrection is imminent and I wish him the|best of luck.

45.「おかえりなさい <pc>。| どうやら 踊り神さまに 認められることが| でき: Welcome back <pc>. Looks like you've|earned the approval of the God of Dance...|that's what I'm talking about!

47.「護符は 持っているだけじゃ 意味がないわよ。| 私が そのチカラを解放してあげ: It's not enough just to have the amulet. I can|unlock its power. So give it to me quickly.

49.「それじゃあ さっそくだけど……| 継承の儀式を 始めるわよ。: Well, then, let's get started right away...|with the rite of succession.

50.「荒ぶる神のチカラを 秘めたる護符よ……。| 継承を認められし者 <pc>に|:
O amulet that holds the power of the raging|god, bestow upon the one who has been granted|the inheritance the profound|
|secrets of the dancer....

52.「……よし。継承成功ね。| その荒神の舞が 放つエネルギー……| それこそが 黒: ...Good. The succession succeeded. The energy|released by that Deity Dance... is the key to|defeating the Hell King.

53.「でも…… 残念ながら それだけでは| ヤツを 完全に浄化することはできない。|: But... unfortunately, that's not enough to|completely cleanse him. There's only one way|to do that...

54.「荒神の舞を ふたり同時に舞うことで| そのチカラを増幅させる 究極の対の舞……: We have no choice but to... complete the|ultimate pair of Deity Dances that amplify the|Deity Dance's power by doing both at once.

55.「私と かつての合方でさえ 荒神連舞を| 完全に 極めることはできなかった……。: Even I and my former partner could not fully|master the Deity Dance...

56.「けれど あなたなら 荒神連舞のチカラに| 耐えられるはず！ 今度こそ 究極の対: But I know you can withstand the power of the|Deity Dance!　I'm sure this time you'll be able|to perform the ultimate pair of dances!

57.「私はね…… <pc>。| 除霊踊りを舞うのは| 私たちで 終わりにしたいと思っ: I am... <pc>. I'd like to finish|dancing the expulsion dance with us.

58.「私の一族は 代々 黒怨王との戦いに| 身を投じ 戦いの中に散っていったわ……。:
For generations, my family has thrown|ourselves into the battle against the Hell|King, and we have been scattered amongst the|
|fray... it was our family's mission, our|destiny.

59.「でもね……やっぱり 仲間たちと| 楽しく踊ったり 舞台に立ったり……。| そう: But...I still enjoy dancing and performing|with my friends... I was happiest during those|times.

60.「ご先祖様が聞いたら 怒るだろうけど……。| 今は そういう踊り子が 増えている: My ancestors would be angry if they heard|this... I am very happy that there are more|and more dancers like that now. So...

61.「世界中の 踊り子たちの幸せのためにも| 黒怨王は倒され 除霊踊りは 古い伝説と: For the happiness of all the dancers in the|world, the Hell King must be defeated and the|Exorcism Dance forgotten as a legend...

62.「それじゃ あなたと共に 荒神の舞を| 舞える日を 楽しみにしているわ。| お互: Well then, I look forward to the day when I|can perform the Deity Dance with you. Let's do|our best for each other.

63.「……と思ったけど これは どういうこと？| すでに 奥義に目覚めているじゃない: ...I was wondering, what does this mean?|You've already awakened to the secrets of the|art. How did you do it without the help of a talisman?

64.「まさか 荒神さまとの戦いの中で| 自然に目覚めた……とでもいうの？| さすが: Don't tell me... you were awakened by nature|during the battle with the Powerful Deity?|That's my partner. I don't know your depths.

65.「それほどの 実力の持ち主に| 喜んでもらえるかは わからないけれど……| これ: I don't know if I can please someone of that|caliber, but...this is a celebration of the|Powerful Deity's recognition.

66.「さて あなたが習得した奥義…… | 荒神の舞が放つ エネルギー。| それこそが: Now, the secret that you have mastered... the|energy that Deity Dance releases. That is the|key to defeating the Hell King.

67.「やつらに とりつかれる人も 増える一方……。| 私も 仕事を減らして 除霊に回: More and more people are being possessed by|him... I've cut back on my exorcism work but|I'll be back to living on bread crumbs.

68.「言ってなかったけど……今までに| 踊り神さまから 認めてもらえたのは| 私と: I never told you this, but... until now, only|two people, myself and my former partner, have|been recognized by the God of Dance.

69.「ふふっ……やっぱり 私の目に狂いは| なかったようね。それじゃあ| 手に入れた: Well... it seems I was right after all. Now|then, please hand over the charm you received.
